correctness.rationale: Largely incorrect and schema-noncompliant. Key issues: (1) Multiple processes: The article reports two distinct ALD processes (ZnO on GaN/c-sapphire and on YSZ). Only one process (GaN) is extracted; the YSZ process is missing. (2) Schema violations: Several fields are set to null/None where objects are required (plasmaPower, supercycleDesign, opticalProperties.refractiveIndex, opticalProperties.absorptionCoefficient, electricalProperties, filmDensity.value.numericValue, deviceProperties.*). These must be omitted or populated with valid objects per schema; nulls are not allowed. (3) GPC value/unit error: growthPerCycle is given as 0.25 Å, but the article states ~0.25 nm/cycle (≈2.5 Å). (4) Dosing/purge times wrong units and values: Article gives 0.5–5 s (precursor dose) and 1–5 s (purge). Extraction uses 0.5 ms and 1 ms with unit MilliSEC—off by 10^3 and not traceable. (5) Flow rates: Only purging N2 500 sccm is reported. PrecursorFlow and coReactantFlow set to 500 are not supported by the article. (6) Ungrounded/fabricated properties: uniformity.variation (0.046%), conformality.aspectRatio (1.0), filmComposition.elementalConcentration and atomicRatio (1:1), nucleationPeriod = 0 cycles, otherAspects.filmStability/reproducibility = True—all lack support in the text. (7) Crystallinity mislabel: Article repeatedly states epitaxial ZnO; labeling as “polycrystalline” is inconsistent. (8) Minor: deliveryMethod should be “flow-type” (reported), carrierGas is unspecified (set to “Not Found” is acceptable but weak), pressure reported as a single value (6 mmHg) from a 6–8 Torr range. Correct or remove the above items, add the missing YSZ process with its distinct GPC (~0.07 nm/cycle) and film thickness (~45 nm), fix time units (use milliseconds but convert seconds to 500–5000 ms and 1000–5000 ms), set GPC to 2.5 Å, and ensure no nulls remain.

completeness.rationale: Major incompleteness and schema violations. (1) Missing processes: The article reports ZnO ALD on two substrates (GaN/c-sapphire and YSZ(111)) with distinct growth rates, thicknesses, and roughness. The extraction includes only one process (GaN), omitting the separate YSZ process (≈45 nm thickness, GPC ≈0.07 nm/cycle, roughness ≈1.9 nm at 300 °C and ≈1.6 nm at 275 °C). (2) Schema violations and nulls: Multiple fields are set to None or placeholders where objects are required (plasmaPower=None, supercycleDesign=None, electricalProperties=None, opticalProperties.refractiveIndex=None, opticalProperties.absorptionCoefficient=None, filmDensity.value.numericValue=None). These violate the schema and the no-empty-values requirement. (3) Incorrect/unsupported values: Growth-per-cycle is wrong by 10× (0.25 Å entered vs 0.25 nm/cycle reported; should be 2.5 Å). Dosing and purge times are given in milliseconds (0.5 ms, 1 ms) while the article reports seconds (0.5–5 s dose, 1–5 s purge); values should be converted (e.g., 500–5000 ms, 1000–5000 ms) or ranges represented appropriately. (4) Flow rates: Only the purging N2 flow (500 sccm) is reported in the article. The extraction incorrectly assigns 500 sccm to precursorFlow and coReactantFlow (not supported) and uses a unit (SCM-PER-MIN) inconsistent with sccm. (5) Untraceable/fabricated fields: Uniformity variation (0.046%), conformality aspect ratio (1.0), filmComposition elemental concentration (1%) and atomic ratio (1:1), nucleationPeriod=0 cycles, filmStability=True, reproducibility=True, carrierGas='Not Found' (N2 is mentioned as purge gas) are not supported by the text. (6) Crystallinity mislabeling: The GaN sample is epitaxial/highly c-axis oriented per XRD/TEM; labeling as polycrystalline is inaccurate. To be complete: add a second process for YSZ; correct GPC units and values; fix dosing/purge times and units; restrict flow data to the reported purge N2 (500 sccm) and correct units; remove nulls/placeholders or omit optional fields; correct crystallinity; and ensure all values are traceable to the article.
